name: Pandora Rose Gold Ring
desc: Add a sophisticated touch to your look with the Sparkling Elevated Heart Ring. The ring draws inspiration from the classic Pandora Timeless collection. Hand-finished in 14k rose gold unique metal blend, this piece features a pink heart-shaped central, elevated stone. Clear cubic zirconia create the halo and decorate half of the ring band, with the Pandora logo inside the shank. Stack this ring with hand-finished styles in sterling silver for a statement mixed metal look.
